text.more: The mapping was undertaken as part of the OECD's work on states of fragility.
text.intro:
This networks seeks to map the landscape of actors (thinktanks, IOs, NGOs, universities) that work on topics related to the fragility of states. The categorization of keywords is based on the OECD's fragility framework and its five dimensions. 
Red: Politcal factors
Blue: Economic factors
Yellow: Security factors
Green: Environmental factors
Purple: Social facors
Other factors outside of the framework are displayed in turquoise. 
Detailed information on the different institutions can be accessed by clicking on the the respective nodes.
text.title: Institutions working on Fragility
